div.p: Greetings through our Lord Jesus Christ.

Revered and gracious Lord Bullinger, my willing service is always at your disposal. If you and yours are in good health, I would be very glad to hear it. As for myself, I give praise and thanks to God the Lord, who may continue to share His grace with us. The reason I have not written to you for some time is that I have been burdened with several affairs. However, since my good friend Christoph Tretius has come here and visited me, also indicating that he intends to travel to you, I did not want to neglect writing to you.
Firstly, I have received your letter dated March 14th along with your work on Isaiah with special thanks, hoping it will be read with particular benefit in Christendom.
Further, you will have already heard that your cousin, the Hedinger, has received his money here; if I could do him any good on your behalf, it shall not lack on my part.

Regarding recent news, there are indeed strange practices and conspiracies at hand, of which I am reluctant to write much, but it is well to suspect that it will affect the poor Christians. For as they write from Italy, the Pope is said to be gathering a great treasure, and the King of Spain is said to be in great armament. It is also said that there is a great provision in the Empire by the Emperor. As some suppose, it is to go over Geneva and Swiss lands, therefore a good vigilance cannot harm. You will also undoubtedly have heard by now how the war at Gotha has proceeded. Herewith I send you the castle along with the city engraved in copper, also a list of the real executions. It is to be considered that such wounds will bleed for a long time, and as they say, it will bring discord among the princes; these are all punishments for our sins. May God the Lord have mercy on us and turn His wrath away from us. Amen.

Herewith I send you a small gift with the request to accept it kindly, to remember me in the best way, and to let me be commended to you and your prayers, and hereby I commend you to the protection and care of the Most High.
